content.question: Which of the following is a disadvantage associated with the genetic modification of crops?

choices.label: Genetically modified crops have a decreased resistance to drought.
Genetically modified crops have a shorter shelf life and are more difficult to transport long distances.
Genetically modifications can decrease the genetic diversity of crop species.
Genetic modifications decrease nutritional content in foods.

content.answer: Genetically modifications can decrease the genetic diversity of crop species.

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Describe disadvantages, advantages, or unintended consequences for potential solutions.
